TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SynchronizationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在各种同步模型中传播同步上下文的基本功能。

span.span: Provides the basic functionality for propagating a synchronization context in various synchronization models.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是提供未同步的自由线程上下文的基类。The class is a base class that provides a free-threaded context with no synchronization. 此类实现的同步模型的目的是允许公共语言运行时，若要使用不同的同步模型也是正常的内部异步/同步操作。The purpose of the synchronization model implemented by this class is to allow the internal asynchronous/synchronous operations of the common language runtime to behave properly with different synchronization models. 此模型还可以简化一些管理的要求的应用程序必须遵循不同的同步环境下正常工作。This model also simplifies some of the requirements that managed applications have had to follow in order to work correctly under different synchronization environments. 同步模型的提供程序可以扩展此类，并提供他们自己的实现这些方法。Providers of synchronization models can extend this class and provide their own implementations for these methods. 有关同步上下文的详细信息，请参阅文章[它是有关 SynchronizationContext 所有](http://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/gg598924.aspx)MSDN 杂志中。For more information about synchronization contexts, see the article [It's All About the SynchronizationContext](http://msdn.microsoft.com/magazine/gg598924.aspx) in the MSDN Magazine.

summary.span: 获取当前线程的同步上下文。

span.span: Gets the synchronization context for the current thread.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示当前同步上下文。

span.span: A object representing the current synchronization context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于传播到另一个线程中的同步上下文。This property is useful for propagating a synchronization context from one thread to another.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，响应操作已完成的通知。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, responds to the notification that an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不包含任何代码。The default implementation contains no code. 您可以选择重写此方法以提供操作已完成时执行的代码。You can optionally override this method to provide code that executes when an operation is complete.

summary.span: 设置指示需要等待通知的通知，并准备回调方法以使其在发生等待时可以更可靠地被调用。

span.span: Sets notification that wait notification is required and prepares the callback method so it can be called more reliably when a wait occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用的外部声明执行等待活动。The method calls the external declaration to perform the wait activity. 重写方法更改为同步上下文的等待行为。Override the method to change the wait behavior for the synchronization context.
